name: "A Dungeon"
description:
Explore the depths and encounter peril. 

Instructions:

Hold "W" to traverse.

Hold "P" to restore your health.

Tab between options with "Q".

A game over results in the game exiting. 

This game was made for GameDevNetwork's Gooseberry jam.

All assets made by me (Yames) with the exception of the fonts DejaVu  and the Goethe ( the former of which is made by Kreative Software).

I'll try to get a version for mac and ubuntu up soon.
